body_html:
Regarding MaxBytesInUse, it would only be useful to find the peak memory usage in case when it does not run out of memory.

The in-review change supports use of cuda unified memory. Should be available at HEAD in one or two days.

It does not support absolute memory limit and it is still configured using the per_process_gpu_memory_fraction field. It would be possible to set greater than 1.0 value after the change. Absolute memory limit can be converted to the fraction using the BytesLimit method.
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/memory_stats/BytesLimit

Hope this helps!
